name: .JENKINSFILE
summary: Learn about .JENKINSFILE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a JENKINSFILE with Microsoft Visual Studio Code or any other text editor, to view and edit the Jenkins Pipeline definition it contains. If possible, you should open a JENKINSFILE with a source code editor that supports Apache Groovy syntax highlighting.
For instructions on how to use a JENKINSFILE with Jenkins Pipeline, refer to Jenkins' official documentation.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .jenkinsfile file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: JENKINSFILE file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
